actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution approving the printing of additional copies of the report to accompany H.R. 39, the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act of 1979.

summary.text: Provides for the printing of additional copies of the report accompanying H.R. 39, the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act of 1979, for use of the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution approving the printing of additional copies of the report to accompany H.R. 39, the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act of 1979.
